item.title: Davinci Resolve Shortcut Mappings
item.description: Access the preference menu Link to heading ctrl + alt + k to access preference menu. Changes Link to heading Split clips: change from ctrl + \ to s Trim End and Trim Start: shift + [ and shift + ] to q and w respectively. (see notes for Davinci Resolve 18) Note Link to heading Davinci Resolve version 18: Start to playhead and end to playhead: ctrl + shift + [ and ctrl + shift + ] to q and w respectively.
